SEARCH
Package Collisions

Class LeaderboardClass

java.lang.Object
Collisions.LeaderboardClass
public class LeaderboardClass extends Object

Leaderboard Management

Class Created to manage the leaderboard functionality This class is able to read and write to a file, sort the leaderboard, and return the leaderboard data
Since:
2024-05-09
